title: Amphitheater at Castrum Rauracense
description: Discovered in late 2021 on the site of the Basler Ruderclub in Augst, this amphitheater lies just west of the Roman fort of Castrum Rauracense. It seems to have been built in an abandoned quarry sometime in the 4th century CE.

properties.description: Location determined by analysis of imagery in Google Earth with reference to drone photos published in the Kanton Aargau press release showing the excavated area in the context of surrounding features.
properties.title: Imagery location of excavation
